channel.title: Space Force on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Space Force on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: A secretive space plane is set to launch and test quantum navigation technology
item.description: “Testing this tech will be helpful for navigation in contested environments.”

item.title: Nearly everyone opposes Trump’s plan to kill space traffic control program
item.description: Space Force officials and more than 450 aerospace companies are against the White House’s proposal.
